reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft, comfortable, and well-made, particularly appreciating it as a nursing piece. The style receives positive feedback for being a cute winter wrap, and customers like the fit. The size and color receive mixed reviews - while some find it roomy, others say it runs big, and while many like the color, some report receiving the wrong shade. The material quality is concerning, with customers d

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft!
items.body: I bought this for family pictures. It did not photograph well but I did love it for every day wear. It is very warm and soft. I have not seen any issues with shrinking and I have worn it thought the winter season. It is thick and feels lime good quality. I love the olive color. Read more
items.author: Amanda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater top!
items.body: Great fit, color and style. Read more
items.author: Lisa Y

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater, not as baggy/casual as pictured
items.body: I wear a size 18-20, 1x-2x in tops and am a 44DD. The material is super soft. There was no weird smell. The sweater was somewhat wrinkly coming out of the package but after 3 days of lying flat, it's just fine now. The sleeves are somewhat balloon-ish. They are tapered at the wrist but balloon out between the forearm and shoulder which looks a little different to me. It's not extreme or anything but I think it looks better when the sleeves are pushed up like in the picture. I was worried about this being too big based on some of the other reviews so I just went with an XL. The sweater fits well but I wish I would have went up a size to get that baggier style I was hoping for. The XL for me is not long enough to wear with leggings. The v neck part also doesn't gape that much. I think again, that if I had gone up a size it would have that flowy baggy style instead of staying pretty closed up. It's a cozy, comfy sweater with just a few minor flaws to me. I think I'm gonna buy another one in a size up and compare the two, I'll update this review with the results. Read more
items.author: Ariel

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars unflattering
items.body: This is a nice mid weight sweater. Fabric is soft and very comfortable, however, it wasn't so flattering on my apply body shape body. Sweaters are meant to hide your flaws and I felt like this accentuated my middle. The cross on the sweater was really high, like mid waist, where in the picture i felt like it was lower, almost toward the bottom of the sweater. So the cut of the sweater just made me feel larger. The v-neckline had a button which i would appreciate if it were a blouse, but it just didn't look right on the sweater. If the neckline is too low, I'd wear a tank or shirt underneath it. The button took away from the neckline, which I didn't like. and when you unbutton it, you could still see the clear snap of one side of the button. I unfortunately did not keep the sweater, even though I really liked the material and the way it felt. Read more
items.author: LVGS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size soft sweater
items.body: Love it. I purchased xxl black and roomy. Material soft and perfect for any occasion. Now to decide what other color to buy Highly recommend Read more
items.author: Mrf

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering sweater.
items.body: Absolutely LOVE this sweater! Fits great. Not too tight, not too loose. button holds the neckline in place. Very flattering look. Comfy! I bought a small and fits perfect. doesn't rise when raising arms, snug around wrists. Read more
items.author: Julie

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor Inconsistent Color Dye All Over
items.body: Sadly, the second time that I have ordered this blue sweater, it comes with dark dying lines Throughout the entire sweater. It actually looks like they may have folded the sweater prior to allowing it to dry completely, and so you have darker lines of dye. I have a red version and it has none of the same issues as this one despite me letting the seller know the concerns… When I re-ordered… They still sent me one that looked exactly if not worse than the first one. Read more
items.author: JHE

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what you expect
items.body: I originally bought this to use as a nursing sweater post-partum and I am still using it. The photos are recent, i.e. more than a year after purchasing it. It’s a soft sweater, lovely pale gray. Lots of stretch. Hits low on hips, which is nice because it looks great with leggings. It definitely pills quickly but easy to take care of with a sweater shaver device. Comfortable, professional, and not so precious that I can’t wear around my kiddos. (Read: great for dressing up for holidays, Ok if their yucky hands get on you!) Go ahead and buy this. Read more
items.author: Michelle H.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Twilight Mauve, Haute Red, Dark Grey, Magenta, Army Green, Black, Moonlight Blue, Almond Brown, Khaki, Cream White, Dark Blue, Light Beige, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
